welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sidi Bou Ali, a charming coastal town in Tunisia known for its beautiful beaches and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to soak in the sun, explore our quaint streets, and enjoy all the wonders this city has to offer. Bon voyage!"

airports.airport_name: Zine El Abidine Ben Ali International Airport

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Habib Bourguiba Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Habib Bourguiba Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
